dataList.content: Dammit, they just won’t stop coming!
We’ll all wear our lives out before we can even take a step inside the casino.
Don’t fret, Heathcliff. As long as the manager is with us, we won’t die from fatigue or other things—
That’s NOT the point at ALL! #@$@#$!!!
The solution is simple: Any organization can be brought down by deposing its leader; with the head gone, the meat supporting it will break apart.
You. You’re the only one speaking my tongue here.
I’m proper miffed, so let’s go break some bones, head, whatever.
Hence, onward we travail!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Wait! Come back here!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …This is the crowd you’re supposed to accompany, Faust?
Life is full of mysteries.
That, perhaps, is what makes it an ideal reflection, no?
Tell me where your gaffer is! I wanna see ‘im, now!
Heathcliff grabbed a mook by the collar and shook it about violently. To me, it looked as if anything still conscious had left already.
…And maybe even more than that.

dataList.title: Tingtang Gang
dataList.content: The sea heart… is gonna be at the car pagoda…
The what? Where the hell is that?! Make sense!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: It’s probably the scrapyard nearby.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Really though, are you actually planning to take down the gang’s boss?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: That won’t be reflected in your employee performance review or anything, you know?
He’s not sharp enough to calculate such things into his actions.
He’s waste, bearing little relation to schemes or plots. On the other hand, he flirts closely with nonsense.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: No… I do think that makes sense.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Nothing to worry about, Effie. We always keep a Plan B, don’t we?
Saude spoke with a serene face.
However, I could see her consciously trying to maintain calm from time to time, giving me reason to suspect that she’s putting on a veil of kindness.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: If disguising as your given roles is out of the question…

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: You can all get up as members of the Tingtang Gang instead.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: That way, you won’t arouse much suspicion moving in a large group, and you’ll be able to reach the top floor without much trouble.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: And we could siphon some wishpower from the Tingtang Gang while we’re at it.
